articles.title: Confusing Jumbles of Rocks in Africa Could Represent Oldest Known Earthquakes - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Our world may seem fragile, but Earth has been around for a very long time.
articles.content:
Our world may seem fragile, but Earth has been around for a very long time. If we ventured far back into the past, would we reach a time when it looked fundamentally different?
The answer lies in so… [+5058 chars]
